fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

Interface IDataDesign

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IThemedDesign
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFormDesign, IListDesign

    public interface IDataDesign
extends IThemedDesign
    Base interface for designing pages bound to a master data source.

    Designs that are not bound to a master data source are considered as generic, and can be bound to any data source (with lower priority than designs that are bound to data sources). A consistent ranking algorithm is applied to select the design to use for a specific page at runtime. The default selection can be overridden by registering implementations of IPageSelector.

    Note: implementations are permitted to defer persistence of design configuration changes for up to a second, to efficiently store a batch of changes. If the design configuration is externally updated when changes are pending (for example, by modifying a configuration file) then the deferred changes will be lost.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IDataPage

      • getMasterSourceId

      • setMasterSource

        void setMasterSource(ISource masterSource)
              throws ConcurrentModificationException
        Sets the data source identifier for master records for this page design.
        Parameters:
        masterSource - the main data source for this page design.
        Throws:
        ConcurrentModificationException - if the design configuration was externally updated when invoking this method.
        Since:
        1.0
